about.text1: You may remember me from such websites as %%i##The Boatjacking of Supership 79%% and %%i##Hydro: the Man With the Hydraulic Arms%%.
about.text2: This website was built with %%c##react%%/%%c##typescript%% and uses %%c##mobx%% for state management. Other than that there are no more installed packages. The language %%c##l10n%% system, the lame %%c##css%%/%%c##scss%% animations, the stupid rock paper scissors game, and other %%c##react hooks%% were created by me.

contact.header1: Contact me to develop wares that are soft

rps.title: Rock Paper Scissors
rps.info: Play against the computer. Select %%b##Rock%%, %%b##Paper%%, or %%b##Scissors%% with the buttons or use the %%b##Arrow%% or %%b##WASD%% keys. Scoreboard keeps track of Player wins, Computer wins, ties, and games played. Reset button clears the scoreboard.

popups.title: Popups
popups.info: Dr. Mantis Toboggan has just given you a virus. Can you close all the popups before he feasts?
